name: Shadow Realm Escape Trail
description:
"It's a dark and deadly world out there and you have to get out alive!

Shadow Realm Escape is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Avoid the shadowy, scary enemies out there and try and escape with your soul!

How far can you go? How much gold can you collect along the way? Collect those power-ups to help you out even more!

Collect enough gold and you can unlock other vehicles for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect gold to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Shadow Realm Escape right now while it's 100% FREE!"
